function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of transparent and credible information for reducing COVID-19 related travel risks.","Impact":"Increased risk of travelers being exposed to COVID-19 and related anxiety.","Mitigation":"Provide clear and honest information about safety measures and best practices for reducing travel risks. Address general travel anxiety in recovery strategies.","Technologies":"Information dissemination tools, digital platforms for education and awareness.","People":"Travelers, tourists, vacationers.","Owner":"Destinations, tourism providers, governments."},{"Description":"Development of COVID-19 travel risk perception and travel anxiety.","Impact":"Decreased trust in travel safety and potential reluctance to travel.","Mitigation":"Implement behavior-specific approaches to reduce travel risk perception and anxiety. Address the drivers of general travel anxiety in recovery strategies.","Technologies":"Behavioral analytics, psychology-based interventions.","People":"Tourists, travelers, vacationers.","Owner":"Tourism providers, destinations."},{"Description":"Uncertainty and development of travel anxiety due to COVID-19.","Impact":"Increased hesitation and uncertainty in making travel plans.","Mitigation":"Provide clear and accurate information to reduce uncertainty and anxiety. Address general travel anxiety in recovery strategies.","Technologies":"Information dissemination tools, communication platforms.","People":"Travelers, tourists.","Owner":"Tourism providers, destinations."}]}
